title: Study Method
brief_description: This “How to Study” guide explores in detail problems students have in studying. Study techniques and their application are examined from both the Educational and Psychological aspects. Includes: effective reading, note taking and study organisation, setting targets and handling anxiety and stress (includes demonstration of relaxation techniques).
